amendment.description: Amendment prohibits funds in the bill from being used to implement certain procedures relating to the public-private competition for Federal jobs and services.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit funds from being used to implement the revision to Office of Management and Budget Circular A-76 made on May 29, 2003.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Andrews amendment (A073) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A073) offered by Mr. Andrews.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Andrews amendment (A073) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
